tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr Aditi is absolutely wonderful with kids
She explains every step directly and is so patient with children
My daughter was so comfortable with her.. 
Excellent Doctor!! 
Highly recommended :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
If You are looking for the best,This is the Place.
Dr. Aditi Mam treats the patients so efficiently with Perfection & her polite nature towards patients is what we expect from our doctors.
Her Assistants are too well trained & just gives you best dental service.
Do visit if you expect a Perfect Treatment.

I visited Dr. Aditi's clinic during the Covid lockdown and i must say that she has taken utmost care and preventive measures during my treatment. I was a little hesitant before visiting her clinic as i didn't know anyone personally who was treated by her but my first appointment with her was very convincing. She is polite and confident about what she recommends and I'm very satisfied with my treatment.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your valuable feedback.

context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Tooth Coloured Fillings,
review: Dr. Aditi Gaur is an well experienced doctor. She is very approachable, friendly and affordable. Her clinic is very well maintained and follows all COVID-19 protocols. I highly recommend her.
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback.

review:
I received orthodontic treatment at Dr.Aditi Gaur's clinic and i am very satisfied with the treatment.
Doctor helped me a lot in making the right choice for the treatment.
Doctor answered all the queries regarding my teeth,for which I'm grateful.
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback ma'am.

review: *** ****** ** ********** Reception and staff are friendly and helpful, would like to recommend to all.
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback

review: Doctor gaur is very gentle,genuine and expert dentist. The  best part is that clinic is pocket friendly. In my opinion she is friendly dentist.One should definately visit to her clinic if he/she is suffering from any kind of problem in teeth and for regular checkup.
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback.
